Key Match Events: Tyler Herro scored 27 points before being ejected in the final minute of the game.
The Heat came from 12 points down in the second half to regain the lead.
Haywood Highsmith made a crucial three-pointer to tie the game.
Herro's jumper with 1:56 to play put the Heat on top for good.
Post-Match Reflections: Tyler Herro believed that Amen Thompson's frustration was due to his performance during the game.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The fight between Tyler Herro and Amen Thompson led to six ejections.
Others: Amen Thompson body-slammed Tyler Herro during the altercation.
Fred VanVleet was ejected before the fight for a 5-second violation.
Houston led 92-85 after VanVleet's layup with 8:10 to play, but the Rockets went cold.
